Outbreak Alert&nbsp;<span style=""><span style="">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=""><span style="">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=""><span style="">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=""><span style="">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span>2. Threat Hunt Rules</div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color);"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); background-color: initial;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>&nbsp; &nbsp; - Outbreak Alert details&nbsp;<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">- Yara Rules</span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color);"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); background-color: initial;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<span pre;">	</span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;- Fortinet Fabric Rules</span></div></div>" style="border-color: var(--border-color);"><b style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 14px;">Run Configuration Wizard<br style="border-color: var(--border-color);"></b>Runs FortiSOAR Outbreak Alert Configuration Wizard to select the "Threat Detection Integrations",&nbsp; and other response workflows e.g. "Ticketing/ITSM Integrations"<br style="border-color: var(--border-color);">&nbsp;" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontFamily=Montserrat;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DMontserrat;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="83.39" y="40" width="370" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zfvIiYYfGIqtBtpJjsEf-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Montserrat;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DMontserrat;" parent="1" source="zfvIiYYfGIqtBtpJjsEf-3" target="zfvIiYYfGIqtBtpJjsEf-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zfvIiYYfGIqtBtpJjsEf-3" value="<b><font style="font-size: 14px;">Install Outbreak Response</font></b><b style="border-color: var(--border-color);"><font style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;Framework&nbsp;</font></b><b><font style="font-size: 14px;">Solution Pack<br></font></b><br>Creates/Installs the the following contents in FortiSOAR<br><ul><li style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Outbreak Alerts and Threat Hunting Module</span></li><li style="text-align: left;">Playbook collection "10 - SP - Outbreak Response Framework"</li><li style="text-align: left;">Required Connectors</li></ul>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontFamily=Montserrat;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DMontserrat;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="33.39" y="-110" width="470" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 367px; height: 1px; padding-top: 325px; margin-left: 132px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Install Outbreak Response Solution Pack
Example: Outbreak Response - Progress MOVEit Transfer SQL Injection Vulnerability".
Following records will be install as part of this solution pack
1. Outbreak Alert 2. Threat Hunt Rules
- Outbreak Alert details - Yara Rules
- Mitigation Details - Sigma Rules
- Fortinet Fabric Rules

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 371px; height: 1px; padding-top: 465px; margin-left: 130px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Fetch CVEs for KEVs
Tag associated CVEs as KEVs, if found, using NVD integration

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 565px; margin-left: 134px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Ingest IOCs as Threat Feeds
IOCs associated with an outbreak are ingested as threat feeds in FortiSOAR using the Fortinet FortiGuard Outbreak connector.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 900px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Perform Signature Based Threat Hunting using
SIEM solutions (QRadar/Splunk/Azure Log Analytics) and creates Outbreak Alerts in FortiSOAR

switch.text: Perform Signature Based Threat Hunting using...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 280px; height: 1px; padding-top: 780px; margin-left: 350px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Perform Signature Based Threat Hunting using Fortinet Fabric solutions (FortiSIEM/FortiAnalyzer) and creates Outbreak Alerts in FortiSOAR

switch.text: Perform Signature Based Threat Hunting using Fo...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 295px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1050px; margin-left: 164px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Ticketing/ITSM
Creates tickets using Ticketing/ITSM Integrations (Jira/ServiceNow) for Outbreak alerts

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 345px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1165px; margin-left: 139px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
text-align: left;
div.span: utomatically blocks all the indicators, of type IP and URL, using the FortiGate Integration

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: Manual: FortiSOAR automatically creates the FortiSOAR Task to block all the indicators

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 295px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1286px; margin-left: 164px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Mitigation
FortiSOAR provides mitigation recommendations, like available patches, using public sources

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 780px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Perform IOC Threat Hunting using Fortinet Fabric solutions (FortiSIEM/FortiAnalyzer) and creates Outbreak IOC Hunt Alerts in FortiSOAR

switch.text: Perform IOC Threat Hunting using Fortinet Fabr...

div.div:
Run Configuration Wizard
Runs FortiSOAR Outbreak Alert Configuration Wizard to select the "Threat Detection Integrations", and other response workflows e.g. "Ticketing/ITSM Integrations"

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Install Outbreak Response Framework Solution Pack
Creates/Installs the the following contents in FortiSOAR
Outbreak Alerts and Threat Hunting Module
Playbook collection "10 - SP - Outbreak Response Framework"
Required Connectors

switch.text: Install Outbreak Response Framework Solution Pack...
